title: Smart Compact Living
summary: A compact and elegant unit ideal for guest homes, ADUs, or urban lots.
marketingDescription: Smart Compact Living offers a **refined minimalist layout** with a focus on **natural light and space efficiency**. Its modern finishes and clean geometry make it perfect for singles, couples, or as a rental unit. Experience the perfect balance of comfort and functionality in a beautifully designed space that **maximizes every square foot**.

title: Family Smart Unit
summary: A balanced modular home designed for young families and flexible use.
marketingDescription: Designed with **growing families** in mind, the Family Smart Unit combines thoughtful space planning with modern amenities. **Open-plan living areas** create a sense of spaciousness, while **smart storage solutions** keep everything organized. This is where memories are made, where life happens comfortably and efficiently.

title: Live & Work Hybrid
summary: Blends residential comfort with workspace functionality — perfect for professionals or home-based studios.
marketingDescription: The ultimate solution for modern professionals who demand both **comfort and productivity**. The Live & Work Hybrid seamlessly integrates a **dedicated workspace** with residential living, featuring **acoustic considerations** and flexible layouts. Work from home without compromising on style or functionality.

title: Executive Comfort
summary: A luxury modular home designed for premium comfort and entertaining.
marketingDescription: Elevate your lifestyle with Executive Comfort, where **luxury meets practicality**. Premium finishes, spacious open-plan living, and a **primary suite with ensuite** create an environment designed for both **relaxation and entertaining**. This is more than a home—it's a statement of refined living.

title: Ultra Compact Retreat
summary: An ultra-compact single-bedroom unit perfect for minimalists, students, or as a cozy retreat.
marketingDescription: Embrace minimalist living without sacrificing comfort. The Ultra Compact Retreat proves that less truly is more, with **intelligent design that maximizes every inch**. Perfect for those seeking an **affordable, low-maintenance lifestyle** or a peaceful retreat. Simple, elegant, and perfectly proportioned.
